metadata.title: CVE-2023-3676 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A security issue was discovered in Kubernetes where a user that can createpods on Windows nodes may be able to escalate to admin privileges on thosenodes. Kubernetes clusters are only affected if they include Windows nodes.

criterions.comment: kubernetes package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
